allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: initial Smart Print application

Complete Electron + React + TypeScript photo printing management system.

Backend \(F001-F004\):
- Project scaffolding with electron-vite, Tailwind CSS v4, shadcn/ui
- Printer integration: discovery, queue, health monitoring, load balancing
- Local file watcher: chokidar, size verification, auto-processing
- Cloud API client: registration, polling, download, retry logic
- CUPS media size query for real paper size detection
- Printer deduplication by device URI serial/UUID

Frontend \(F005-F007\):
- B3 "Soft Studio" design: Plus Jakarta Sans, copper accent, frosted glass
- Full light/dark mode via CSS variables + zustand persist
- Settings: mode selection, directory picker, printer pool, paper size
- Monitor: hero stats, print queue, printer status, activity feed
- Gallery: photo grid, detail panel, batch operations, search/filter
- Zustand stores bridging IPC to React with localStorage persistence
- Auto-restore settings and start watcher on launch

Design exploration \(kept as reference\):
- 5 design concepts: A, B, B2, B3, C

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 \(1M context\) <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
